mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.case_id AS "caseId", a.decision_type AS "decisionType", a.year AS "year", a.seq AS "seq", a.record_org AS "recordOrg", a.compile_date AS "compileDate", a.print_count AS "printCount", a.destination_address AS "destinationAddress", a.party_name AS "partyName", a.content AS "content", a.launch_dept AS "launchDept", a.launch_date AS "launchDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
